name: Doohickey Research District
desc: Doohickey's research and specialty items are developed and produced here. A small number of those can be adquired - for a price.

name: Silly Research Park
desc: A massive research complex (for post-collapse standards) stands in $market. Varied experiments with Silly Particles are conducted here, it's results quickly shipped to the marketing and sales department. This state of the art facility provides a great amount of exotic and advanced weaponry and hulls.

name: Orbital Station - Silly
desc:
A silly space station, featuring heavy firepower on one side and rapid axial rotation.

Must be reduced before a bombardment can be attempted.
